messages.title: CHIDI SAYS...
messages.content:
"We will help Newham's small businesses by demanding a stop to rent increases until Newham is fully open and transparent about its banking arrangements."

"Having worked in finance for over 15 years, I've seen both sides of the coin. I know some of the more questionable practices used in selling banking treasury. This experience will provide more insight into Corporate treasury issues if elected, and I hope that we can push this topic into the national agenda."

To shape an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment. To build affordable homes and provide properly funded public services. And to put power back in your hands through a citizen's democracy.

Only the Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government's extreme Brexit. Only the Green Party have the vision to deliver an alternative future for our country and our place in the world. And only the Green Party offers a different kind of politics.

community.content: We will help Newham's small businesses by demanding a stop to rent increases until Newham is fully open and transparent about its banking arrangements.

leaflet.personalStatement: Chidi Outi Obihara lives in Beckton and became a member of the Green Party while working on our joint investigations into Newham Council's mis-sold Lender Options Borrower Options loans. Prior to joining the Green Party, Chidi now works as an Independent Consultant for Corporate treasury issues.

Only the Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government's extreme Brexit. Only the Green Party have the vision to deliver an alternative future for our country and our place in the world. And only the Green Party offers a different kind of politics.

Chidi Outi Obihara lives in Beckton and became a member of the Green Party while working on our joint investigations into Newham Council's mis-sold Lender Options Borrower Options loans. Prior to joining the Green Party, Chidi now works as an Independent Consultant for Corporate treasury issues.
We will help Newham's small businesses by demanding a stop to rent increases until Newham is fully open and transparent about its banking arrangements.

Only the Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government's extreme Brexit. Only the Green Party have the vision to deliver an alternative future for our country and our place in the world. And only the Green Party offers a different kind of politics.
